description: Perform common tasks in Nagios related to downtime and notifications.

servicegroup.description: The Servicegroup we want to set downtimes/alerts for. B(Required) option when using the C(servicegroup_service_downtime) amd C(servicegroup_host_downtime).

author.description: Author to leave downtime comments as. Only usable with the C(downtime) action.

services.description: What to manage downtime/alerts for. Separate multiple services with commas. C(service) is an alias for C(services). B(Required) option when using the C(downtime), C(enable_alerts), and C(disable_alerts) actions.

host.description: Host to operate on in Nagios.

command.description: The raw command to send to nagios, which should not include the submitted time header or the line-feed B(Required) option when using the C(command) action.

action.description: Action to take. servicegroup options were added in 2.0. delete_downtime options were added in 2.2.

minutes.description: Minutes to schedule downtime for. Only usable with the C(downtime) action.

cmdfile.description: Path to the nagios I(command file) (FIFO pipe). Only required if auto-detection fails.
